column1: ake umojwetse hore papa ha ejelellwe ka ditapole
jwetsa mahlobohang hore uneubina ka thapelong
ake uqoqele mami hore uneurobetse le mang
mahlobohang ake umphe poone yane yaka ketlobona na e jwang
tlong letlontjwetsa koloi yane ke ya mang
letlareka dipompong le eng ha ntate tebele
nkebekaufa chelete ha uhana hobua tjee
ke ya ntate mang koloi eo ntate hm
mololo nka isa poone ena yaka ha
ke ya mang poone uiloebesa ntate
aa hle mmannyeo ako tloo ntjwetsa
na eneeile kliniking poone ena yaka maobane
tamati uilewaefuwa ke mang maobane kliniking
tamati uilewaefuwa ke mang maobane kliniking
tamati uilewaefuwa ke mang maobane kliniking
ntho engwe le engwe ke ya lapeng
ee ha se poone ntho ena keekhethang
ditapole ha di yo ka mono
utlapalama koloi ya ntate mang ha uya kliniking
ha eseeuntsitse madi mona utlafumana untseure nyee
sheba mme ouchaketse feela wena umosiya le mang
kere na usiya moeti enwa wahao uiloetsa koloi
ulata koloi retsamaye le wena reye kae
reya kampong kapa reya habo natatiele
oo njwetse pele hore rakhadi wahao ke mang
ntho ee ke jesi ke ya mang
mami ore le ntate tebele oneaile kliniking na
e ntlele le phafa eo mahlobohang
ake ujwetse mami hore ke eng ntho ena
ditapole tsa hae dijuwe ke mang
malimakatso ore letlise thipa ena yahae
